title: My friend can't install
body: https://gyazo.com/c7d9a1d93146f42c5a29c0c07b6322e3 <-- That is a pic of the error he gets Microsoft visual c++ 2005 Redistributable (x64). Does anyone know a fix to this?

replies.body:
The 1935 error is commonly resolved by updating Windows, then [uninstalling all current versions](http://www.bleepingcomputer.com/tutorials/uninstall-a-program-in-windows/) of Visual C++ 2005, following up with a fresh version [from here.](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)

Let me know if this helped resolve this for your friend. ^.^
